testimonials.title: Students
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what people are saying üí¨
testimonials.bottomText: Join 10,000+ students who've found better opportunities
testimonials.nextStory: Your success story could be next

testimonial1.name: Priya
testimonial1.content: Okay so I used to spend HOURS scrolling. Now? I get 5 matches that actually make sense. The transparency thing where it shows WHY I matched? Game changer honestly.

testimonial2.name: Rahul
testimonial2.content: Bruh, the auto-resume thing is insane. I had no clue how to write one that ATS systems would actually read. YuvaSetu just... did it? Got my offer in 2 weeks.

testimonial3.name: Ananya
testimonial3.content: Living in a small town with terrible internet, the SMS alerts literally saved me. Never missed a single opportunity even when WiFi was down. They really thought this through.

testimonial4.name: Vikram
testimonial4.content: The AI actually GETS it. Like, it understood that my mechanical background + Python = perfect for automation roles. Mind = blown ü§Ø

testimonial5.name: Neha
testimonial5.content: Finally! A platform that doesn't throw 500 jobs at me and expect me to figure it out. Clear explanations, curated list. Way less stressful.

testimonial6.name: Arjun
testimonial6.content: The semantic matching is wild. I mentioned TensorFlow once and it connected me to Deep Learning roles automatically. This is literally the future.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about YuvaSetu and how we're transforming career discovery.
faq.answer1: YuvaSetu is an AI-powered career platform that eliminates opportunity fatigue by  matching you with your top 5 most relevant job opportunities using explainable AI. We provide transparent recommendations so you understand exactly why each job matches your profile.
faq.question2: How does the AI matching work?
faq.answer2: Our matching engine uses lightweight, efficient machine learning models to analyze your skills, experience, and preferences. Unlike heavy language models, we focus on delivering fast, accurate matches with complete transparency - you see exactly why each job was recommended to you.
faq.answer3: Yes! YuvaSetu is completely free for students. We believe every student deserves access to quality career opportunities without financial barriers. Our mission is to help you find the right job, not to profit from your job search.
faq.question4: How is this different from other job portals?
faq.answer4: Unlike traditional job portals that overwhelm you with hundreds of listings, YuvaSetu shows you only your top 5 most relevant matches. We use explainable AI to tell you exactly why each job fits you, eliminating guesswork and opportunity fatigue.
faq.answer5: YuvaSetu is built with production-ready technology optimized for scale. By using efficient ML models instead of heavy LLMs, we deliver superior results with lower cost, lower latency, and high scalability - ready to serve millions of users.
faq.answer6: Employers can post job opportunities on YuvaSetu and leverage our AI matching to find the best candidates. Our system helps you discover talent that truly fits your requirements, saving time and improving hiring quality.
